code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const pages=[{name:'Головна',path:'home'},{name:'Про школу',path:'about'},{name:'Контакти',path:'contact'},{name:'Новини',path:'news'},{name:'Розклад',path:'schedule'},{name:'Вчителі',path:'teachers'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-6",children:"\u0410\u0434\u043C\u0456\u043D \u043F\u0430\u043D\u0435\u043B\u044C \u0448\u043A\u043E\u043B\u0438"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid",style:{display:'grid',gridTemplateColumns:'repeat(auto-fill, minmax(300px, 1fr))',gap:'1rem'},children:pages.map(page=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/admin/editor/".concat(page.path),className:"bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow-md hover:shadow-lg transition-all border block no-underline text-inherit",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-2",children:page.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600",children:"\u0420\u0435\u0434\u0430\u0433\u0443\u0432\u0430\u0442\u0438 \u043A\u043E\u043D\u0442\u0435\u043D\u0442 \u0441\u0442\u043E\u0440\u0456\u043D\u043A\u0438"})]},page.path))})]});};export default Dashboard;
